```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(spatstat)
```

# Poisson Processes
```{r}
h_pp <- rpoispp(100)
ih_pp <- rpoispp(function(x,y) {100*exp(-4*y)}, 100)

plot(coords(h_pp), pch=19, xlab="",xaxt="n", ylab="",yaxt="n", col="blue")
plot(coords(ih_pp), pch=19, xlab="",xaxt="n", ylab="",yaxt="n", col="blue")
```
